title: Bioinformatics Engineer
description: Develop computational tools for analyzing biological networks and ecosystem data. Strong background in biology and software engineering required.
responsibilities: Design and implement bioinformatics pipelines for large-scale data analysis
Develop tools for analyzing fungal genomic and transcriptomic data
Collaborate with biologists to translate research needs into software solutions
Maintain and optimize existing computational infrastructure
Contribute to open-source bioinformatics tools and libraries

requirements.education: BS/MS in Bioinformatics, Computer Science, Biology, or related field
requirements.experience: 3-5 years of experience in bioinformatics or computational biology
skills: Proficiency in Python, R, and shell scripting
Experience with genomics data formats (FASTA, FASTQ, VCF, etc.)
Knowledge of statistical analysis and data visualization
Familiarity with cloud computing platforms (AWS, GCP)
Understanding of molecular biology and genetics
preferred: Experience with mycology or fungal genomics
Knowledge of machine learning applied to biological data
Experience with workflow management systems (Nextflow, Snakemake)
